problem_text:
For a finite group G and a permutation group K, let bG(K) denote the number of conjugacy classes of regular subgroups of K isomorphic to G. Does there exist a function f such that bG(K) ⩽ n f(r) for every abelian group G of order n and rank r, and every group K such that K(2) = K? (See Archive 19.67 for the definition of K(2).)
I. Ponomarenko
